_sText:
In 1981, a crew called " The Siempre " has establed their base
in one of the old mines of Mexico. The Siempre crew has a well know
terrorist group in sevral countries comited by sevral war crimes and
vialation of the human rights. The crew was unstoppable and day by day,
the UNAC (United Nations Against Crime) has giving up the search.

	In the 90's the crew has stollen a precious artefact from the
international museum in Houston, Texas. But what they did't count on, was 
that the mine keepers were suspecting about something and saw the terrorist
group killing one of their's hosties and locking up AK's in storages.
	With the new intel giving by the mine keepers, the UNAC started 
a search on those mines...

<hr>

Terrorist's: Someone is calling... It's post 3 from base entrace. They were
over attack! 

They can't reach our treseares. Blow up the cemetary and the
railtrack mines to stop them to reach our hide out!

                           We count on you! 
                                           Miguel Esteves, Lider of "The Siempre"



Counter-Terrorist's: Trought the dark mines I have fear, but I hear shots and I
can't stop myself to going in...
" Hostile down! ", they says, but the blood and gore I only ear.

" Get yourselves ready Unit-2, you are going in... "

                           Good luck in there. We count on you!
                                            Jack Fisherman, Sargeant Major of UNAC

______________________________________________________________________________________
